messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Test Area.
